text: Lakeland Christian Academy is the name of several schools in the United States or Canada: * Lakeland Christian Academy (Alberta), in Cold Lake, Alberta, Canada * Lakeland Christian Academy (Kentucky), in Moorehead, Kentucky, USA * Lakeland Christian Academy (Texas), in Lewisville, Texas, USA * Lakeland Christian Academy (Indiana), in Winona Lake, Indiana, USA == See also == * Lakeland Christian School * Lakeland (disambiguation)
title: Lakeland Christian Academy
